definition: to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]

sentences.english: A method for preparing chicken erythrocyte membranes in the form of small vesicles has been described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了一种以囊泡形式制取鸡红细胞膜的方法。

sentences.english: This book is really Juliette's story, told in the third person.
sentences.chinese: 全书实际上是以第三人称叙述了朱丽叶的故事。

sentences.english: This paper presents the concept of system generation.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述系统生成的概念。

sentences.english: And it narrates main design approaches and the confirmation to parameter.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了主要的设计步骤和参数的确定。

sentences.english: His narrative is a super rendering of dialect speech and idiom.
sentences.chinese: 他的叙述是方言和土语最成功的运用。

sentences.english: At first, no one would publish his work because of his experimental formats, but he was determined to continue writing anyway, for his own fulfillment.
sentences.chinese: 他的许多作品都是从一个弱智儿童的眼光来叙述的。

sentences.english: The technological chain of producing heat-resistant porcelain with the local ban-cite was narrated in particular.
sentences.chinese: 主要叙述采用本地红墙石试制耐热瓷的工艺过程。

sentences.english: An experimental study to investigate bubble detachment point in the sub-cooled boiling at low pressure and velocity is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了低压低流速下过冷沸腾汽泡脱离点的试验研究。

sentences.english: Five synthesis methods of the third generation nicotinic insecticide-dinotefuran are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了第三代烟碱类杀虫剂呋虫胺的5种合成方法。

sentences.english: Several fundamental characteristics and applications of the PTC thermistor are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了PTC热敏电阻的几种基本特性及其应用。

sentences.english: The narrator bowed his head, and the boys shouted.
sentences.chinese: 叙述者低下头来，和孩子们喊道。

sentences.english: The application method and requirements for this getter has also been described.
sentences.chinese: 同时还叙述了该消气剂的使用方法和要求。

sentences.english: The film flashed forward to show us the result of her decision.
sentences.chinese: 影片提前向我们叙述了她的决定所产生的结果。

sentences.english: In this paper, the loudspeaker array in the public address system is described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述扩声系统用的扬声器组阵。

sentences.english: It has good judge of the user. The article is describe main menu a…
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了计费系统的主菜单及有关内容。

sentences.english: Author mark is very obvious in the description interposing in "first love".
sentences.chinese: 作者在《初恋》中设置的叙述标记非常明显。

definition: to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
to repeat (one's own words or sb else's)/(in the classroom) to paraphrase what one has learned
variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to flash back/flashback (in a novel, movie etc)
